action-view.name: invoice.root.my.awaiting.pfp
action-view.title: My awaiting PFP
action-view.domain: ((self.invoice IS NOT NULL AND self.invoice.statusSelect IN (2,3)) OR (self.invoice IS NULL AND self.moveLine.move.statusSelect IN (2,3))) AND self.pfpValidateStatusSelect = 1 AND self.pfpValidatorUser = :_currentUser

action-view.name: invoice.root.pfp.awaiting.pfp
action-view.title: awaitingPfpMenuTitle
action-view.domain: ((self.invoice IS NOT NULL AND self.invoice.statusSelect IN (2,3)) OR (self.invoice IS NULL AND self.moveLine.move.statusSelect IN (2,3))) AND self.pfpValidateStatusSelect = 1

action-view.name: account.root.my.awaiting.pfp
action-view.title: My awaiting PFP
action-view.domain: self.pfpValidateStatusSelect IN (1,4) AND self.pfpValidatorUser = :_currentUser AND ( self.moveLine.move.statusSelect = 3 OR (self.moveLine.move.statusSelect = 2 AND self.moveLine.move.company.accountConfig.isManageDaybookInPFP = true))

action-view.name: account.root.pfp.awaiting.pfp
action-view.title: awaitingPfpMenuTitle
action-view.domain: self.pfpValidateStatusSelect IN (1,4) AND (self.moveLine.move.statusSelect = 3 OR (self.moveLine.move.statusSelect = 2 AND self.moveLine.move.company.accountConfig.isManageDaybookInPFP = true))

action-view.name: account.root.payments.suppl.invoices.to.pay
action-view.title: Suppl. Invoices to pay
action-view.domain: self.operationTypeSelect = 1 and self.statusSelect = 3 and self.amountRemaining != 0 and self.pfpValidateStatusSelect in :_pfpStatus
